title: Constructing cyburbia
creator_credit: Emma Byrnes and Victoria University Press
brief_description: A CD-ROM constructed as part of an interactive media course at Victoria University of Technology, Constructing Cyburbia is a documentary-style look at the linked sociological phenomena of home renovation and personal homepage development. The work uses interviews and examples to affectionately explore common elements and aesthetic styles of the personal homepage.
